name: The fire Fades
description:
What you need to know :

The player moves by pressing Z,Q,S,D.
Press mouse button left to strike.
Enemies can only be killed by throwing them in fire!
If you throw a torch and a weapon together, an new fire is created.
the enemies spawn in some sort of portal, you can deactivate them by putting them in the light of a fire(torch or status does not work).
The enemies wants to blow your Blue flame out, so when the light fades out, you lose. You win when every portals are deactivated.

We are waiting for feedbacks since it's our first game made during The Ludum Dare 43

Team :

- Graphics : Marina Letendre
- Management and sound design : Arnaud Royer
